title: Ticket #4520: 8.2/8.3 Testing Effort
description:
Queued up work
  1. In workiing on condor_urlfetch test #5245 we get a return value of 5 for a temp file issue on windows #5242
  2. sinful unit test back on
  3. sinful unit test off for fixing - done
  4. timer failure in concurrency tests as noted in remoarks on ticket #5036
  5. EndTest has no test name when shutdown and check core files is called for personal condors which were never started. Check the state of the condor instance before trying to stop it.
  6. write a test for condor_urlfetch for windows and linux #5211
  7. rename batch_test.pl => run_test.pl and adjust 8_5_x glue
  8. correlate in a table the recent red tests from 20/21 8.3.7 flury
  9. move python unit tests to regular tests #5165
  10. Run a python test run file #5165
  11. create a test for urlfetch #5177
  12. why are the lib_ccb_schedd, lib_ccb_startd and unit_test_sinful failing #5139
  13. why does remote_task print stuff in this ticket when the test failed for other reasons #5117
  14. Stress test userlog writing code for truncated or missing events #5141
  15. Fix concurrency tests callback usage and periodic failure #5036
  16. Fix multiple usage of Timed Callback in tests #5037
  17. condor submit language changes #4819 and new macros #4944 #4954
  18. Defects discovered with cygwin work #4901 #4902
  19. remove cygwin as a requirement for windows testing #4862
  20. fix ssl auth test #4840
  21. fix gsi auth test #4841
  22. condor_ststus -submitters reports correct numbers #4580
  23. two shared_port-check-ports_van, loose one?
  24. create a simple fetch work test.
  25. #4640 regression test ?
  26. #4905 regression test

Work Partially done

  1. Sporadically failing tests(ie RED). #3741
  2. create usable setup for workstation testing #4441
  3. what happens to testing with share port daemon on. #4485

Goals

  1. Convert multi file tests to new style to remove clutter and understand the tests easier info: #3844
  2. Have test glue and workstation testing base core config from condor_install.

Run as root tests - Stalled

  1. validate if can't runas owner run as slot-user see #4389
  2. Network latency and impact

Stalled Test

  1. Old Soap test off till it can be fixed 6/27/13
  2. Perl test for schedd SOAP interface #3583
  3. Bologna batch system #3654
  4. New Audit Log Test #3637
  5. Python binding tests
  6. Agressive Flocking #4287 bug?

Revisit

  1. Config file #include #4322 referring to #4319

Informational

  1. Test possibly bleeding personal condors #4129
  2. Test which fail when nmi busy #3990
  3. Test failures from overly simple calls on various condor tools #3916

Window Test Fixes

  1. Proto-type having dagman nodes run perl jobs #4567
  2. lib_shared_port-collector_van

Resolved

  1. Get rid of summary file for failed and passed tests written by batch_test which will soon be run_test.
  2. update image sizes for shadow growth detection prior to 8.4 and 8.5
  3. Rework core file and ERROR string finding #4935
  4. Update CondorCmdWorker2.pm to add jobs via SimpleJob #4873
  5. clean up and clarify job_core_max-running_local #4846
  6. shake off general log rotation test not currently being run #4839
  7. New test for schedd log rotation #4834
  8. Move 370 lines of functions to a perl module all 6 concurrency_limits tests use. #5113 This will allow easier test debugging and easier understanding.
  9. We were never caring if all of a test personal condor shut down #4953 resulting bug #4965
  10. all cmd_status tests run without cygwin #4794
  11. validate condor status can take ads from a file test #4538 see #4414
  12. on windows job_dagman_abort-B fails #4744
  13. Create special file which changes the CONDOR_CONFIG source to have file's contents appeneded to master condor_config #4671
  14. Make batchtest run on active perl #4604
  15. Make initial config one from install_condor #4605
  16. Modernize job_core_basic_par and job_core_chirp_par to new style single file tests. #46331: Glue changes impacting how we configure personals and cygwin use. #4587
  17. Hyperthread validation #4523
  18. Check respect for MAX_JOBS_RUNNING #4553?
  19. Robust Job Retention Test #4521
  20. Add a test for transferring folder contents to top of sandbox #4532
  21. Config file #include #4322 referring to #4319

Last effort ticket

  1. Prior to v080200 and v080300 #3594
